title: APENDIC-RADS: an ultrasound reporting system for the diagnosis of acute appendicitis
details: MRG Queiroz, VA Jabour, JL Souza, MR Paixão… - einstein (São Paulo), 2024
abstract: Objective: Abdominal ultrasonography is widely used to evaluate suspected cases of appendicitis. Objective descriptions of the direct and indirect signs of appendicitis result in varied assessments of its likelihood. This study introduces the Appendix …

title: Scan That Barcode Carefully—Limitations of “M-Mode” Ultrasound When Screening for Pneumothorax
details: YS Bronshteyn, S Krishnan, L Abramson, O Al-Qudsi - A&A Practice, 2024
abstract: A wide range of procedures performed by and/or involving anesthesiologists have the potential for causing life-threatening pneumothorax. 1–4 While screening for pneumothorax often begins with a chest X-ray (CXR), a supine CXR appears to have …
